12 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save KuzoKevin OP 14 points 1 day ago Should we use taxpayer dollars to pay the rent and mortgages of trannies? Fuck off. permalink award report block reply Klaus73 2 points 19 hours ago We can call it TRAP permalink parent award report block reply boredrandomguy 2 points 20 hours ago Send them to an isolated island where they can play pretend all they want. Then after about a month or so, cut them off of their puberty blockers and hormones. permalink parent award report block reply someguy7738 1 points 24 hours ago Of course we should! First get them one of those big beautiful 50 year mortgages so they can "afford" housing, then make the taxpayers fund it, extortionate interest and all! Bankers must never see even a slight dent in their profits! permalink parent award report block reply KuzoKevin OP 4 points 1 day ago Link - https://twitter.com/teameffujoe/status/1988314146140733909 permalink award report block reply goatnuts 3 points 18 hours ago Framing it like their homes get taken from them for being trans. These people need to shut the fuck up. They're so full of shit. permalink award report block reply Modern_Times 2 points 20 hours ago How many lost their homes when their spouse found out and divorced them? permalink award report block reply Klaus73 2 points 19 hours ago Last I heard 58% of all trans folks eventually lose their homes. permalink award report block reply TerrorAndSlaughter 2 points 19 hours ago It's not because they are insane; it's because they don't pay their rent/mortgage.
